title: Mukul Rohatgi appointed as eminent jurist in Lokpal panel: Govt
article_body: NEW DELHI: Senior advocate has been appointed as an eminent jurist in the selection committee for appointment of the Lokpal, the Centre told the Supreme Court on Tuesday. Attorney General K K Venugopal told a bench headed by Justice that a decision was taken on May 11 appointing Rohatgi as an eminent jurist in the selection committee, which is chaired by the Prime Minister. Rohatgi was appointed as Attorney General of India after the government assumed power in May 2014. He resigned from the post in June 2017. The post of eminent jurist in the Lokpal selection panel was lying vacant since the death of senior advocate P P Rao on September 11, 2017. The bench, on hearing the submissions, posted the matter for further hearing on July 2. It was hearing a contempt petition filed by NGO Common Cause, which had raised the issue of non-appointment of the anti-graft ombudsman despite the apex court's verdict of April 27 last year.
